Item ID24421

The Inquisitor's plateskirt is a drop from The Nightmare, requiring 70 Strength and 30 Defence to equip, and is part of the Inquisitor's armour set.

When equipped, the plateskirt boosts damage and accuracy by 0.5% when using the crush attack style. If all three pieces of the armour are equipped, the boost is increased to 2.5%. In addition, it counts as a Zamorakian item in God Wars Dungeon.

Once belonging to "The Inquisitor", a former Saradominist Justiciar and one of the founders of Slepe, the Inquisitor's armour had remained sealed in the Sisterhood Sanctuary deep beneath Slepe until The Nightmare's arrival unearthed it.

[[File:Inquisitor's plateskirt detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''Inquisitor's plateskirt''' is a drop from [[The Nightmare]], requiring 70 [[Strength]] and 30 [[Defence]] to equip, and is part of the [[Inquisitor's armour]] set.

When equipped, the plateskirt boosts damage and accuracy by 0.5% when using the [[crush]] [[attack style]]. If all three pieces of the armour are equipped, the boost is increased to 2.5%. In addition, it counts as a [[Zamorak]]ian item in [[God Wars Dungeon]].

Once belonging to "[[The Inquisitor]]", a former [[Saradomin]]ist [[Justiciar]] and one of the founders of [[Slepe]], the Inquisitor's armour had remained sealed in the [[Sisterhood Sanctuary]] deep beneath Slepe until The Nightmare's arrival unearthed it.
